      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(String playerName,
                             String pwToCheck)
        Check if the given password matches the one stored in the Database.
        Parameters:
        playerName - The name of the player who's password is being checked.
        pwToCheck - The password that will be checked against the database.
        Returns:
        A boolean value showing whether the password matched the stored one.

                             String password)
